Message: feat: reads versions from lock files
Description: Reading from the appropriate lock files instead of the package.json means having a better idea of what packages are installed. With the package.json, there's a chance to miss the actual installed version due to using a range like ^7.0.0 whereas with the lock file, the version is printed to what the package manager resolved. To make this more easily achievable, I refactored the info.action.ts file to be more class based so I could reuse the package manager instead of having to re-find it each time. re: #896
